languages.text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents a character's talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach their desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.
languages.original_text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g}.
Он представляет собой талант манипулировать другими людьми с помощью запугивания и добиваться своего, применяя угрозы и давление в диалогах.

traits.locale_text:
This skill depends on Fellowship characteristic.
Represents a talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach the desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

This skill depends on Fellowship characteristic.
Represents a talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach the desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents a character's talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach their desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

languages.text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} beeinflusst.
Sie steht für das Talent eines Charakters, andere durch Einschüchterung zu manipulieren und die gewünschten Ziele durch Drohungen und Druck im Dialog zu erreichen.
languages.original_text:

It represents a character's talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach their desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die Eigenschaft Gefolgschaft beeinflusst.
Sie steht für das Talent eines Charakters, andere durch Einschüchterung zu manipulieren und die gewünschten Ziele durch Drohungen und Druck im Dialog zu erreichen.

languages.text:
Cette compétence repose sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.
Elle mesure la capacité d'un personnage à manipuler quelqu'un en ayant recours à l'intimidation, et à atteindre ses objectifs par le biais de menaces et de pressions lors d'un dialogue.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents a character's talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach their desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

traits.locale_text:
Cette compétence repose sur la caractéristique Fraternité.
Elle mesure la capacité d'un personnage à manipuler quelqu'un en ayant recours à l'intimidation, et à atteindre ses objectifs par le biais de menaces et de pressions lors d'un dialogue.

languages.text:
此技能受{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}影响。
代表角色通过恐吓来操纵他人，在对话中通过威胁与施压达到目标的能力。

languages.original_text: This skill represents a talent to manipulate other people through intimidation.

languages.text:
Esta habilidad se basa en la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} del personaje.
Representa el talento de un personaje para manipular a otras personas mediante la intimidación y alcanzar sus metas mediante amenazas y presión durante el diálogo.

languages.text:
このスキルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}の影響を受ける。
威嚇で他の人を操り、キャラクターの才能を表す。これは、威嚇で他の人を操り、会話中に脅迫し圧力をかけて望ましい目標を達成するキャラクターの才能を表す。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It represents a character's talent to manipulate other people through intimidation and reach their desired goals via threats and pressure during dialogue.

traits.locale_text:
このスキルは連帯特性の影響を受ける。
威嚇で他の人を操り、キャラクターの才能を表す。これは、威嚇で他の人を操り、会話中に脅迫し圧力をかけて望ましい目標を達成するキャラクターの才能を表す。

languages.text:
Bu yetenek, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliğine{/g} dayalıdır.
Bir karakterin başkalarını korku yoluyla manipüle edebilme ve diyaloglarda tehdit ve baskı kullanarak istediğini elde edebilme becerisini yansıtır.
